title: Brushing your Dogs Teeth
description: Prevents plaque build up, Look for any broken teeth when cleaning, Check for any gum disease

title: Grooming your cat
description: Prevents excessive hair shedding, Look out for any unnoticed lumps, reduces fur balls

title: Tips for larger dogs
description: Avoid vigorous exercise, keeping your dog calm after there meal, maintain a healthy weight

title: Cat Scratching Posts
description: Keeps for cats claws healthy, great exercise, reduces the risk of damaged furniture
